contentHeader.name: SpindleLib
contentHeader.author: Piotr Gliszczyński
contentHeader.Comment: This Library allows to control spindles with simple FB. If you need to add another spindle option - just extend SpindleManager

ProjectInformation.property: This Library allows to control spindles with simple FB. If you need to add another spindle option - just extend SpindleManager

ST.xhtml: SUPER^( i_runCW := THIS^.i_runCW, i_runCCW := THIS^.i_runCCW, i_reset := THIS^.i_reset, i_targetVelocity := THIS^.i_targetVelocity, q_actualVelocity => THIS^.q_actualVelocity, q_error => THIS^.q_error, q_spindleStopped => THIS^.q_spindleStopped, q_spindleTargetReached => THIS^.q_spindleTargetReached);
THIS^.q_driveEnable := TRUE;
THIS^.q_driveAnalogCommand := i_setPosition;
THIS^.q_driveAnalogCommand := 0;
THIS^.q_driveEnable := FALSE;
SUPER^.update(); THIS^.q_actualVelocity := THIS^.i_driveActualVelocity;
isError := THIS^.i_driveInError;
isPowerOn := THIS^.i_drivePowerON;
isSpindleStopped := THIS^.i_driveStopped;
isSpindleTargetReached := THIS^.i_driveTargetReached;

SUPER^( i_runCW := THIS^.i_runCW, i_runCCW := THIS^.i_runCCW, i_reset := THIS^.i_reset, i_targetVelocity := THIS^.i_targetVelocity, q_actualVelocity => THIS^.q_actualVelocity, q_error => THIS^.q_error, q_spindleStopped => THIS^.q_spindleStopped, q_spindleTargetReached => THIS^.q_spindleTargetReached);
q_accRamp := TO_UINT(i_accRamp * 100); q_dccRamp := TO_UINT(i_dccRamp * 100);
THIS^.q_controlWord.0 := FALSE; THIS^.q_controlWord.1 := TRUE;
THIS^.q_frequencyCommand := 0;
THIS^.q_controlWord.0 := TRUE; THIS^.q_controlWord.1 := FALSE;
SUPER^.update(); THIS^.q_actualVelocity := THIS^.i_outputFrequency;
isPowerOn := (THIS^.i_statusWord.1 OR THIS^.i_statusWord.0);
isSpindleTargetReached := (THIS^.i_statusWord.0 AND THIS^.i_statusWord.1) AND (THIS^.i_outputFrequency <= THIS^.q_frequencyCommand + 100 OR THIS^.i_outputFrequency >= THIS^.q_frequencyCommand - 100);

SUPER^( i_runCW := THIS^.i_runCW, i_runCCW := THIS^.i_runCCW, i_reset := THIS^.i_reset, i_targetVelocity := THIS^.i_targetVelocity, q_actualVelocity => THIS^.q_actualVelocity, q_error => THIS^.q_error, q_spindleStopped => THIS^.q_spindleStopped, q_spindleTargetReached => THIS^.q_spindleTargetReached);
isError := THIS^.i_statusWord.3 OR THIS^.i_statusWord.7;
isPowerOn := THIS^.i_statusWord.1;
IF isError THEN IF errorReset() THEN IF writeRamps() THEN THIS^.nextStatus := SpindleMaganerStatus_e.STANDBY; END_IF END_IF ELSE THIS^.nextStatus := SpindleMaganerStatus_e.STANDBY; END_IF
writeRamps := TRUE;
wasChanged := FALSE;

Library.Name: #CBML
Library.DefaultResolution: Common Behaviour Model, * (3S - Smart Software Solutions GmbH)
